Report - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model
The report class represent the situation present of an island and permit the computation of the influence, to represent the situation of the island the report have the attributes to represent the owner of an island, the number of tower, the students for each color, and the extra point for a ColorTower due to the activation of a character card
Report(ColorTower, int, Map<Color, Integer>, ColorTower, int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Report
Constructor of the entity Report, Report is the entity used to calculate the influence of a island, is created by the method getreport in island
reportTest() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.ReportTest
This method test the values inside a Report object
ReportTest - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model
This class contains the test for the class Report

resetPlayedCards() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
This method is needed to reset the Hashtable playedCards.
resetRemainingExchanges() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
Some characters allow to exchange students more than once in a single turn.
resetRemainingMoves() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
The variable remainingMoves is needed to remember how many times the current player can still move a student.
returnTest() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.DashboardTest
This method tests the getter of the dashboard
Rule - Interface in it.polimi.ingsw.model.rules
The interface Rule has to be implemented by every Rule class, it assures the implementation of the methods calculateInfluence, updateProfessor, isActionNeeded, getMotherNatureExtraMovement, getMaximumExchangeMoves, exists different type of rules depending on the current active CharacterCard, and this methods cover the aspects that change in the game if a different card is active
RulesDialog - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui
This class represent the dialog containing the rules of the game
RulesDialog(JFrame) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.RulesDialog
This method is the constructor of the class
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.ClientGUI
This method is the default method called in ClientGui, it set the ping the client will exchange with the server to check the connection, manage the games from the client perspective creating the window to join a game and the window that contain the game
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.Connection
This method is the principal method of the class, receive the messages and notify them to the RemoteView through the message receiver
run() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
This method is the principal method of the server and continuously accepts new connections and manage them
